name: DataCollection
code:
DataCollection* = ref object
  components: seq[DataComponent]
  indexes: Table[string, int]
  dirname: string
  basename: string

name: nodes
code: iterator nodes*(dirname: string; filter: proc (path: string): bool = nil): PathNode

name: mapData
description: Open a directory and then initialize it to a new <cite>DataCollection</cite>.

name: hasIndex
code: template hasIndex*(c: DataCollection; path: string): bool

name: getIndex
code: template getIndex*(c: DataCollection; path: string): int

name: isDataFile
code: template isDataFile*(c: DataCollection; index: int): bool

name: isDataDir
code: template isDataDir*(c: DataCollection; index: int): bool

name: getDataFile
code: template getDataFile*(c: DataCollection; index: int): DataFile

name: getDataLink
code: template getDataLink*(c: DataCollection; index: int): DataLink

name: getHomeList
code: proc getHomeList*(c: DataCollection): seq[tuple[name, url: string]]

name: update
code: proc update*(c: DataCollection; index: int; content: string)
